resources.string: Athelstan is a main character in the first, second and third season. He is played by George Blagden and first appeared in Wrath of the Northmen. He reappears in visions during the fourth season.

Bjørn Jernside was a legendary viking warlord, of Danish origin, who would have lived in the 9th century. According to legend, the nickname Järnsida was given to him because he was invulnerable after his mother gave him a magic potion.
Floki is a main character in the first, second, third and fourth season. He is played by Gustaf Skarsgård and first appeared in Rites of Passage.
Lagertha was, according to local legends, a Viking skjaldmö who lived in the territory of present-day Norway, having been the first wife of the famous Viking warrior Ragnar Lodbrok.
Rollo, son of Ragnualdo, was a Viking leader, founder and first ruler of the Duchy of Normandy from 911 to 927.
Ragnar Lodbrok or Ragnar Hairy Pants was a legendary king of Denmark and Sweden, who would have reigned during the 8th and 9th centuries.
